        Parameters:
        fusionSpec - The fusion specification object.
        ruleCatalog - The rule catalog object.

      • combineFusedAndWrite

        public void combineFusedAndWrite(FusionSpecification fusionSpecification,
                                 List<LinkedPair> fusedEntities,
                                 EnumDatasetAction defaultDatasetAction)
                          throws FileNotFoundException,
                                 IOException
        Produces the output result by creating a new graph to the specified output or combines the fused entities with the source datasets based on the fusion mode.
        Parameters:
        fusionSpecification - The fusion specification object.
        fusedEntities - The list with fused LinkedPair objects.
        defaultDatasetAction - the default dataset action enumeration.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - Thrown when file was not found.
        IOException
